consumables.name: Engine oil
consumables.notes: Interval depends on oil spec and driving conditions

consumables.name: Cabin air filter
consumables.notes: Maintains HVAC efficiency and air quality

consumables.name: Coolant/Antifreeze
consumables.notes: Follow OEM spec and service interval

consumables.name: Wiper blades
consumables.notes: UV and ozone degrade rubber; time-based also applies

wear_items.name: Brake pads
wear_items.notes: City driving and heavy loads shorten life

wear_items.name: 12V battery
wear_items.notes: Approximation for 2â€“3 years under mixed use

wear_items.name: Accessory/serpentine belts
wear_items.notes: Inspect each service; replace by cracks/noise

wear_items.name: Suspension bushings and links
wear_items.notes: Replace by wear/noise; rough roads shorten life

wear_items.name: Shock absorbers/struts
wear_items.notes: Replace by leakage or handling decline

powertrain_timing.name: Timing belt
powertrain_timing.notes: Preventive; often replaced with water pump

transmission_and_driveline.name: Wheel alignment
transmission_and_driveline.notes: After impacts or uneven tire wear

service_patterns.name: 30-60-90k services
service_patterns.notes: Expanded inspections and scheduled replacements at ~50k, 100k, 150k

service_patterns.name: Tire rotation
service_patterns.notes: Combine with oil service for convenience

service_patterns.name: Routine inspections
service_patterns.notes: Belts, hoses, suspension, battery tests at each minor service

assemblies.name: Engine
assemblies.description: Converts fuel energy into mechanical power via combustion and reciprocating components.

assemblies.name: HVAC
assemblies.description: Heats, ventilates, and air-conditions the cabin to regulate interior comfort and defog windows.

assemblies.name: Brakes
assemblies.description: Hydraulic system that converts pedal force into clamping friction at wheels to slow or stop the vehicle.

assemblies.name: Cooling
assemblies.description: Circulates coolant to absorb and dissipate engine heat through the radiator and related components.

assemblies.name: Visibility
assemblies.description: Wipers and related components that maintain clear driver sightlines in adverse weather.

assemblies.name: Electrical
assemblies.description: Power generation, storage, and distribution for starting, charging, lighting, and control electronics.

assemblies.name: Ignition
assemblies.description: Generates and times the spark to ignite the air-fuel mixture in gasoline engines.

assemblies.name: Fuel system
assemblies.description: Stores, filters, and delivers fuel to the engine under controlled pressure and flow.

assemblies.name: Tires/Wheels
assemblies.description: Provide traction, support vehicle load, and transmit acceleration, braking, and steering forces.

assemblies.name: Accessory drive
assemblies.description: Belt-driven system powering alternator, water pump, power steering pump, and A/C compressor.

assemblies.name: Suspension
assemblies.description: Springs, dampers, and links that support the vehicle and manage ride, handling, and wheel control.

assemblies.name: Engine timing (belt)
assemblies.description: Toothed belt system synchronizing crankshaft and camshaft timing of valves and pistons.

assemblies.name: Engine timing (chain)
assemblies.description: Chain-driven mechanism that synchronizes crankshaft and camshaft with tensioners and guides.

assemblies.name: Transmission
assemblies.description: Varies gear ratios and transmits engine torque to the driveline (automatic, CVT, or manual).

assemblies.name: Transmission/Driveline
assemblies.description: Gearboxes, transfer case, driveshafts, and differentials that deliver torque to driven wheels.

assemblies.name: Chassis
assemblies.description: Structural underbody that supports suspension, powertrain, and body, maintaining alignment and safety.

assemblies.name: Service bundles
assemblies.description: Grouped maintenance packages at set mileage intervals covering inspections and planned replacements.

assemblies.name: General checks
assemblies.description: Routine inspections of belts, hoses, fluids, suspension, brakes, and battery condition.
